headline: VRT Rides On Strong Organic Order Growth: A Sign for More Upside?
summary: Vertiv's Q2 organic orders increase 15% year over year to $3 billion for the first time, with an $8.5 billion backlog and strong regional momentum fueling growth.

raw.headline: VRT Rides On Strong Organic Order Growth: A Sign for More Upside?
raw.summary: Vertiv's Q2 organic orders increase 15% year over year to $3 billion for the first time, with an $8.5 billion backlog and strong regional momentum fueling growth.

headline: Eaton (ETN) Partners With ChargePoint To Revolutionize EV Charging Infrastructure
summary: Eaton (ETN), in collaboration with ChargePoint Holdings, announced the launch of an ultrafast charging architecture aimed at addressing grid constraints and scaling charging solutions for electric vehicles. This innovative launch might have supported the company's stock, which saw a 11% rise over the last quarter. During this period, Eaton also reported solid earnings growth and share buybacks, reinforcing investor confidence. Although the broader market climbed to record highs, driven by...

headline: Eaton and ChargePoint unveil ultrafast EV charging solution
summary: The ChargePoint Express Grid is set to make its debut at the upcoming RE+ trade show in Las Vegas, US.

raw.headline: Eaton and ChargePoint unveil ultrafast EV charging solution

headline: Eaton to participate in the Morgan Stanley 13th Annual Laguna Conference on September 11
summary: DUBLIN, August 29, 2025--Intelligent power management company Eaton (NYSE:ETN) today announced that its Chief Executive Officer, Paulo Ruiz, will participate in Morgan Stanley’s 13th Annual Laguna Conference on September 11, 2025, at 2:35 p.m. Pacific time. Mr. Ruiz will speak to investors in a fireside chat about the company’s growth strategy in key end markets, such as data centers, utilities and aerospace, and more.
